Articles.Content: Hello, i'm there to ask about name of one of KSP mods. This mod allows you to go back in time and fly other stage of rocket etc. For example it's important with missions, where you drop rocket from airplane to don't lose airplane after detach (After getting an orbit you can go back in time and steer the plane to go back).

Welcome to the forum!

Here's the mod:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/72605-105-flight-manager-for-reusable-stages-fmrs-v1001/

Edited January 18, 2016 by Evanitis
